Namespace PacManBot.Utils

Classes

Brainfuck

Represents a Brainfuck program and allows its execution.

This implementation's details are:

  1. Byte value overflow/underflow on 0-- and 255++

  2. Runtime error on out-of-bounds memory access.

  3. Unchanged cells during and after an EOF on input.

  4. An added # instruction for debugging.

Brainfuck.BrainfuckException

A runtime excepton thrown by a Brainfuck program.

CommandHelp

Wrapper that builds user help for a command.

ConcurrentRandom

A wrapper for System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider with methods inherited from System.Random for ease of use. Main purpose is good randomness and thread-safety.

EnumTraits<TEnum>

Holds a runtime cache of many traits about an enum type.

LoopedList<T>

Wrapper class for a System.Collections.Generic.List<T> whose index accessors loop around if out of bounds.

Range

A finite and ordered sequence of integers.

WebUtil

Enums

TimePeriod

A period indicated in hours for the score leaderboard, useful to parse from a string.
